Detailed Description

template<class T_StreamEndpoint, class T_VDev, class T_MediaCtrl>
class TAO_AV_Endpoint_Reactive_Strategy< T_StreamEndpoint, T_VDev, T_MediaCtrl >

Reactive strategy base class.
